Text: Risk Pool Report Please find attached the risk pool report as of Regards Carol North

FW A K Steel Confirmation Draftwe ever get confirmation on the legal issues I dont want to release a confirmation if we are not sure we can do this transaction Please let me know how to proceed Carol North Original Message From McClendon Lisa Sent Tuesday May AM To Stoler Lou Ernst Nicholas Cc Wood Shelly Herod Brenda F North Carol Davis Del Subject A K Steel Confirmation Draft Lou Nick As requested attached is a draft copy of a confirmation for the optional steel purchase from A K Steel I am not sure this is the type of document needed for this part of the transaction as I discussed with Nick this morning I also think we need an additional agreement other than a confirmation or master agreement to actual define the deal the gas fixed price option the payment of over twelve months the option to purchase the steel over a month period Also there is no provision in this confirmation to address extending credit to AK Steel I would like to meet with you for further discussions If you have any questions please let me know

RE AK steel Cc below We can get comfortable without a guarantee Carol please look at pg paragraph of the K report Also please se answers to questions below Original Message From St Clair Carol Sent Wednesday May AM To Ernst Nicholas Cc Stoler Lou North Carol Curry Ken Subject Re AK steel Nick Thanks Just a few questions for Carol and Ken Will there still be a MAC trigger and if so will it remain at the parent level Yes and it will remain at the parent level I am assuming that we still want to receive Holdings financials Yes we want AK Holdings financials we also want a representation in the contract that states that AK Holdings financials are the same as AK Steels financials because it is the only wholly owned subsidiary of AK Holdings Sounds like what we want AK Steel to say is that it will remain as the only subsidiary of Holdings Is that the concept that you want them to covenant about in the ISDA I would suggest doing it as a covenant so that it would lead to an Event of Default if it is violated Does anyone have any thoughts on this Yes we want to say that if AK Steel is NOT the only wholly owned sub then it is an event of default It can be cured by a parent guarantee or by providing independent financial statements for AK Steel Carol St Clair EB Phone Fax Nick nronXgate PM To Carol St CT cc Subject AK steel Credit said that they will wave the parent guarantee The provision will be waved if AK Steel states whether in financial documents or by written letter that every entity within AK Steel Holding is also every entity within AK Steel Corp I have passed this on my contact in AK Steels Treasury and they are going to get back to me I will be on the road tomorrow but you can leave me a voicemail with any questions Nick

RE AK steel Cc below We can get comfortable without a guarantee Carol please look at pg paragraph of the K report Also please se answers to questions below Original Message From St Clair Carol Sent Wednesday May AM To Ernst Nicholas Cc Stoler Lou North Carol Curry Ken Subject Re AK steel Nick Thanks Just a few questions for Carol and Ken Will there still be a MAC trigger and if so will it remain at the parent level Yes and it will remain at the parent level I am assuming that we still want to receive Holdings financials Yes we want AK Holdings financials we also want a representation in the contract that states that AK Holdings financials are the same as AK Steels financials because it is the only wholly owned subsidiary of AK Holdings Sounds like what we want AK Steel to say is that it will remain as the only subsidiary of Holdings Is that the concept that you want them to covenant about in the ISDA I would suggest doing it as a covenant so that it would lead to an Event of Default if it is violated Does anyone have any thoughts on this Yes we want to say that if AK Steel is NOT the only wholly owned sub then it is an event of default It can be cured by a parent guarantee or by providing independent financial statements for AK Steel Carol St Clair EB Phone Fax Nick nronXgate PM To Carol St CT cc Subject AK steel Credit said that they will wave the parent guarantee The provision will be waved if AK Steel states whether in financial documents or by written letter that every entity within AK Steel Holding is also every entity within AK Steel Corp I have passed this on my contact in AK Steels Treasury and they are going to get back to me I will be on the road tomorrow but you can leave me a voicemail with any questions Nick
